DASHBOARD.clickIcon1: Click the icon to take your test, you have absolutely
DASHBOARD.clickIcon2: minutes to do all of the tests below

INSTRUCTION.timeLimit: The time limit for this test can be found at the top right corner.
INSTRUCTION.readQuestion: Read the following questions and select the best answer.
INSTRUCTION.haveComplete: Once you have completed the test,

TOEIC.title: TOEIC Listening and Reading Test
TOEIC.desc1: This test assesses English-language listening and reading skills.
TOEIC.desc2: The entire test is 200 questions long and will last 129 minutes. There are 4
TOEIC.desc3: parts in the Listening Test section (100 questions) and 3 parts in the
TOEIC.instruction1-2: button at the bottom to move to the next question(s).
TOEIC.instruction2-2: icon at the bottom left corner to go back to
TOEIC.instruction3-1: There may be more than 1 question on the same screen.
